title: My home screen for League has shrunk?
body: So somehow my league of legends home screen has shrunk, is there any way of fixing this?

replies.body: The client can be scaled!  Hold Ctrl and tap + to increase its size.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JRtL7WAG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-22T17:22:07.944+0000)
>
> The client can be scaled!  Hold Ctrl and tap + to increase its size.

Thank you! Didn't know about this so really helpful!
